  release_create:
    name: Release crate ${{ github.event.inputs.version }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: initial_release
    steps:
      -
        name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with:
          ref: ${{needs.initial_release.outputs.commit}}
          submodules: true
      -
        name: Install toolchain
        uses: actions-rs/toolchain@v1
        with:
          toolchain: stable
          target: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
          override: true
          default: true
      -
        name: Publish crate
        run: cargo publish
        env:
          CARGO_REGISTRY_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CARGO_REGISTRY_TOKEN }}

  release_container:
    name: Release container ${{ github.event.inputs.version }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: initial_release
    steps:
      -
        name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with:
          ref: ${{needs.initial_release.outputs.commit}}
          submodules: true
      -
        name: Login to ghcr.io
        uses: docker/login-action@v2
        with:
          registry: ghcr.io
          username: ${{ github.repository_owner }}
          password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      -
        name: Build and push container
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v3
        with:
          context: .
          push: true
          tags: |
            ghcr.io/${{ github.repository_owner }}/timvw-hello-rs:${{ github.event.inputs.version }}
